TGRR.summary: Tiger Reef, Inc. produces ultra premium rum under the Tiger Reef brand name and develops casual dining restaurant properties in the Caribbean. The company was formerly known as Blue Water Bar & Grill, Inc. and changed its name to Tiger Reef, Inc. in October 2016. Tiger Reef, Inc. was founded in 2013 and is based in Cole Bay, the Netherlands Antilles. Tiger Reef, Inc. is a subsidiary of BWG Investments & Development, Ltd.
